description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple & Sweet Chilli Marinated Pork Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pineapple & Sweet Chilli Marinated Pork Ribs
name: Pineapple & Sweet Chilli Marinated Pork Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove ribs from oven and increase temperature of oven to 200°C. Use tongs to dip ribs into glaze and return to baking dish. Cook, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until ribs are sticky. Serve with salsa and remaining glaze on the side.
